EGRC, EGRC Con?guration data
25.1 EGRC Con?guration data
� Con?guration Data
Name Mode Coded Limits Display Limits Resolution Unit
NC_EGR_CONF - 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
Con?guration for EGR - dependency (0 =inactive; NO EGR)
� FUNCTION DESCRIPTION:
� General information:
The constant NC_EGR_CONF describes whether a system is equipped with external exhaust gas recirculation
or not.
25.1.1 Local con?guration data
Here are listed the con?guration data, which can be used in EGRC aggregates:
SIMOS 8.1:
Data  Value  
NC_EGR_CONF 0 (no external EGR available)  
 
SIMOS 8.2:
Data  Value  
NC_EGR_CONF 0 (no external EGR available)

EGRC, EGRC dummy outputs
25.2 EGRC dummy outputs
� Data De?nition
Name Mode Coded Limits Display Limits Resolution Unit
AV_FLOW_EGRV O 0... FFFFH 0... 2048 0.03125 kg/h
Current EGR ?ow at EGR valve
IGA_BAS_EGR_COR O 80... 7FH -48... 47.625 0.375 �CRK
Added basic spark advance with EGR
IGA_BAS_S_EGR_COR O 80... 7FH -48... 47.625 0.375 �CRK
Added basic spark advance with EGR in strati?ed
IGA_REF_EGR_COR O 80... 7FH -48... 47.625 0.375 �CRK
Added reference spark advance with EGR
LV_CDN_ON_EGR O 0... 1H 0 ...1 - -
EGR ?ow activation condition
LV_CMD_EGRV_EGR_DIAG O 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
EGR valve activated by EGR diagnosis/adaptation
LV_END_AD_EGR O 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
EGR adaptation ended
LV_END_DIAG_EGR O 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
EGR system diagnosis ended
LV_ERR_EGR O 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
Present failure of EGR system
LV_ERR_EGR_2 O 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
Stuck valve or potentiometer failure
LV_ERR_EL_EGR O 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
Boolean for error currently present on electrical part of exhaust gas recirculation (after debounce)
LV_ERR_POTI_EGR O 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
Boolean for error on potentiometer of EGR valve due to supply voltage failure or potentiometer failure
LV_REQ_AD_EGR O 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
EGR valve adaptation request
LV_REQ_DIAG_EGR O 0... 1H 0 ...1 1 -
EGR system diagnosis request
LV_REQ_ON_EGR O 0... 1H 0 ...1 - -
Request for EGR ?ow activation
SP_FLOW_EGRV O 0... FFFFH 0... 2048 0.03125 kg/h
EGR ?ow setpoint at the valve
TEGR_ESTIM_DOWN O 0... 535H 0... 1000 0.75 �C
EGR temperature for EGR gas ?owing into the manifold
V_EGR O 0... 3FFH 0... 4.995117 5/1023 V
EGR valve opening raw acquisition
� General information:
For systems without external Exhaust Gas Recirculation (NC_EGR_CONF = 0) the aggregate outputs of EGRC
have to be initialized to neutral values. If no EGR is available, the present module and the EGRC con?guration
module will be the only modules of the EGRC aggregate present in the ECU software. If EGR is available, the
present module will not be present in the ECU software.
